Encroach.definition: to enter esp. gradually or stealthily into the possessions or rights of another [ es on an adjoining property]
Encroach.origin: [Anglo-French encrocher , probably alteration of acrocher to catch hold of, seize, usurp, from Old French, from a -, prefix stressing goal + croc hook]
